Pre-Game Insights: England is looking to bounce back after a disappointing loss to New Zealand in the opening encounter of the ODI World Cup 2023.
Bangladesh had a dream start to the competition, beating Afghanistan in their opening encounter courtesy of Mehidy Hasan Miraz and Nazmul Hossain Shanto's half-centuries.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match between England and Bangladesh will be played at the Himachal Pradesh Cricket Association (HPCA) Stadium in Dharamshala.
The live streaming of the match between England and Bangladesh will be on Disney+ Hotstar.
According to the Dafabet, the odds for this Cricket World Cup 2023 match are England 1.21 and Bangladesh 4.70.
Others: The ICC World Cup 2023 game between England and Bangladesh will be played on Tuesday, October 10, 2023.
The game between England vs Bangladesh is scheduled to kickstart at 10:30 (IST) (+5:30 GMT).
